anya-e1102n4:1_0: Idāni saṅgho ca dullabho loketi padassa vaṇṇanākkamo sampatto. Tattha saṅghoti paramatthasammutivasena
anya-e1102n4:1_1: duvidho hoti. Tesu paramatthasaṅgho cattāri purisayugāni, aṭṭhapurisapuggalā, cattālīsampi
anya-e1102n4:1_2: puggalā, aṭṭhasatampi purisapuggalāti catubbidho hoti. Tattha saṅkhepavasena sotāpattimaggaṭṭho
anya-e1102n4:1_3: phalaṭṭhoti ekaṁ yugaṁ, sakadāmimaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti ekaṁ, anāgāmimaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti
anya-e1102n4:1_4: ekaṁ, arahattamaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti ekanti cattāri purisayugāni honti. Cattāro maggaṭṭhā
anya-e1102n4:1_5: cattāro phalaṭṭhāti aṭṭhapurisapuggalā honti. Cattālīsampi puggalāti sotāpattimaggaṭṭho
anya-e1102n4:1_6: paṭhamajhānikādivasena pañca, tathā sakadāgāmianāgāmiarahattamaggaṭṭhāpi pañca pañcāti
anya-e1102n4:1_7: vīsati maggaṭṭhapuggalā, tathā phalaṭṭhāpi sotapattiphalaṭṭhādivasena pañca pañcāti
anya-e1102n4:1_8: vīsati phalaṭṭhāti cattālīsapuggalā honti. Ettha ca maggassa ekacittakkhaṇikattā
anya-e1102n4:2_1: cattāropi maggaṭṭhā paṭhamajjhānikādivohāraṁ labhantā paccekaṁ pañcapañcadhā vibhajiyanti,
anya-e1102n4:2_2: tasmā vīsati maggaṭṭhā honti. Tattha paṭhamajjhānādīsu yaṁ yaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā
anya-e1102n4:2_3: tato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasantassa vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanā pavattā, taṁ pādakajjhānaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_4: vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya padaṭṭhānabhāvato. Yaṁ yaṁ jhānaṁ sammasantassa sā pavattā,
anya-e1102n4:2_5: taṁ sammasitajjhānaṁ. ‘‘Aho vata me paṭhamajjhānasadiso maggo pañcaṅgiko, dutiyajjhānādīsu
anya-e1102n4:2_6: vā aññatarasadiso caturaṅgikādibhedo maggo bhaveyyā’’ti evaṁ yogāvacarassa uppannajjhāsayo
anya-e1102n4:2_7: puggalajjhāsayo nāma. Tattha yena paṭhamajjhānādīsu aññataraṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā
anya-e1102n4:2_8: tato vuṭṭhāya pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre sammasitvā maggo uppādito hoti, tassa so maggo paṭhamajjhānādi
anya-e1102n4:2_9: taṁ taṁ pādakajjhānasadiso hoti. Sace pana vipassanāpādakaṁ kiñcijhānaṁ natthi, kevalaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_10: paṭhamajjhānādīsu aññataraṁ jhānaṁ sammasitvā maggo uppādito hoti, tassa so sammasitajjhānasadiso
anya-e1102n4:2_11: hoti. Yadā panayaṁ kiñci jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā tato aññaṁ sammasitvā maggo uppādito
anya-e1102n4:2_12: hoti, tadā puggalajjhāsayavasena dvīsu aññatarasadiso hoti. Evaṁ samathayānikassa
anya-e1102n4:2_14: aññatarajhānasadisassa maggaṅgikassa pavattanato puggalabhedavasena vīsati maggaṭṭhā
anya-e1102n4:2_15: puggalā honti, tathā phalaṭṭhāpi vīsatīti cattālīsaariyapuggalā honti. Aparampi sace
anya-e1102n4:2_16: pana puggalassa tathā vidho ajjhāsayo natthi, anulomavasena heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajhānato
anya-e1102n4:2_18: sammasitajjhānasadiso hoti. Paṭilomavasena uparūparijhānato vuṭṭhāya heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajhānadhamme
anya-e1102n4:2_19: sammasitvā uppāditamaggo sammasitajjhānamanapekkhitvā pādakajjhānasadiso hoti, heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajhānato
anya-e1102n4:2_20: hi uparūparijhānaṁ balavataranti, aṭṭhasatampi purisapuggalāti tattha ekabījī, kolaṁkolo,
anya-e1102n4:2_21: sattakkhattuparamoti tayo sotāpannā. Kāmarūpārūpabhavesu adhigataphalā tayo sakadāgāminoti
anya-e1102n4:2_22: te sabbepi dukkhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññaṁ, dukkhapaṭipadā khippābhiññaṁ, sukhāpaṭipadā
anya-e1102n4:2_23: dandhābhiññaṁ, sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññanti catunnaṁ paṭipadānaṁ vasena catuvīsati,
anya-e1102n4:2_25: uddhaṁsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti avihāsu pañca anāmigāno, tathā atappāsudassāsudassīsupi
anya-e1102n4:2_26: pañca. Akaniṭṭhesu pana uddhaṁsotavajjā antarāparinibbāyī, upahaccaparinibbāyī, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī,
anya-e1102n4:2_27: asaṅkhāraparibbāyīti cattāroti catuvīsati anāgāmino. Sukkhavipassako, samathayānikoti
anya-e1102n4:2_28: dve arahanto, cattāro maggaṭṭhāti catupaññāsa te sabbepi saddhādhurapaññādhurānaṁvasena
anya-e1102n4:2_29: dveguṇe hutvā aṭṭhasataṁ ariyapuggalā honti. Te sabbepi ‘‘aṭṭhasataṁ vā’’ti vitthāravasena
anya-e1102n4:2_30: uddiṭṭhā ariyapuggalā te saṅkhepato yugavasena sotāpatti maggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti ekaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_31: yugantyādinā cattārova honti. Tenevāha ratanaparitte ‘‘ye puggalā aṭṭhasataṁ pasatthā,
anya-e1102n4:2_32: cattāri etāni yugāni hontī’’ti ayaṁ pabhedomaggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhesu missakavasena labbhati
anya-e1102n4:2_33: jhānikavipassakapabhedo pana phalaṭṭheyeva labbhati maggassa ekacittakkhatikattā
anya-e1102n4:2_34: maggaṭṭhesu na labbhati. Tattha sotāpattiphalaṭṭho jhānikasukkhavipassakavasena duvidho.
anya-e1102n4:2_35: Tesu jhāniko puggalo tasmiṁ bhave arahattappatto parinibbāyati. Appatto brahmalokagato
anya-e1102n4:2_36: hoti, so jhāniko nāma. Mūlaṭīkāyaṁ pana nikantiyā sati puthujjanādayo yathāladdhajjhānassa
anya-e1102n4:2_37: bhūmibhūte suddhāvāsavajjite yattha katthaci nibbattanti tathā kāmabhavepi kāmāvacarakammabalena
anya-e1102n4:2_38: ‘‘ijjhati hi bhikkhave sīlavato cetopaṇidhi visuddhattā’’ti vuttaṁ. Anāgāmino pana
anya-e1102n4:2_39: kāmarāgassa sabbaso pahīnattā kāmabhavesu nikantiṁ na uppādentīti kāmalokavajjite
anya-e1102n4:2_40: yathāladdhassa bhūmi bhūte yattha katthaci nibbattantī’ti vuttaṁ tathā hi anāgāmisseva
anya-e1102n4:2_41: kāmabhave nikantiyā pahīnattā sotāpannasakadāgāmīnampi nikantiyā sati kāmabhave kāmāvacarakammabalena
anya-e1102n4:2_42: uppattibhāvo avāritova hotīti viññāyati tasmā ‘‘appatte brahmalokagato hoti, so jhāniko
anya-e1102n4:2_43: nāmāti idaṁ yebhuyyavasena vutta’’nti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Sukkhavipassako pana tividho ekabījī,
anya-e1102n4:2_44: kolaṁkolo, sattakkhattuparamoti. Tattha eko manussaloke vā hotu chadevaloke vā, ekapaṭisandhiko
anya-e1102n4:2_45: hutvā arahattaṁ patvā parinibbāyati, ayaṁ ekabījī nāma eko manussaloke ekā paṭisandhi
anya-e1102n4:2_46: devaloke ekāti dvepaṭisandhiko vā, evaṁ ticatupañcachaparamo hutvā arahattaṁ patvā
anya-e1102n4:2_47: parinibbāyati, ayaṁ kolaṁkolo nāma. Eko manussaloke sotāpanno hutvā devaloke ekā
anya-e1102n4:2_48: paṭisandhi tato punāgantvā manussaloke ekāti evaṁ manussadevalokamissakavasena tattha
anya-e1102n4:2_49: cattāri idha tīṇityādinā tattha cha, idha ekoti yāva sattapaṭisandhiko hutvā parinibbāyati,
anya-e1102n4:2_50: ayaṁ sattakkhattuparamo nāma. Kevalaṁ pana manussaloke yeva satta devalokeyeva vā
anya-e1102n4:2_51: sattāti evaṁ amisso hutvā paṭisandhiko gahetabbo apare pana ‘‘ito satta, tato satta
anya-e1102n4:2_53: sattakkhattuparamaṁ vadanti. Taṁ ayuttaṁ kasmā ‘‘kiñcāpi te honti bhusaṁpamattā,
anya-e1102n4:2_54: na te bhavaṁ aṭṭhamamādiyantī’’ti pāḷiyā virodhattā. Apica dvibhavaparicchinno sakadāgāmīpi
anya-e1102n4:2_55: dvikkhattuṁ manussalokaṁ āgato bhaveyya, tassapi tattha ekaṁ, idha ekanti vārassa
anya-e1102n4:2_56: labbhitabbato na panevaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Sakiṁ imaṁ manussalokaṁ āgacchatīti sakadāgāmī
anya-e1102n4:2_57: idha patvā idha parinibbāyī, tattha patvā tattha parinibbāyī, tattha patvā idha parinibbāyī,
anya-e1102n4:2_58: idha patvā tattha parinibbāyīti pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu pañcamako idha adhippeto. Yadi
anya-e1102n4:2_59: evaṁ idha patvā idha parinibbāyīti ādayo cattāro kathaṁ sakadāgāmīnāmāti. Te sakiṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_60: puna āgacchatīti vacanatthena sakadāgāmī nāma. Kāmataṇhāya sabbaso pahīnattā imaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_61: kāmadhātuṁ anāgacchatīti anāgāmī, niccaṁ brahmalokeyeva paṭisandhi vasena āgacchatīti
anya-e1102n4:2_62: adhippāyo. Jhānikassa evaṁ hotu, sukkhavipassakassa kathanti sopi jhānikova hutvā
anya-e1102n4:2_63: gacchati tassa hi maggantare sīhabyagghādīhi hatassāpi lakkhaṇattayaṁ āropetvā jhāniko
anya-e1102n4:2_64: hutvāva maraṇaṁ hoti ayaṁ pana rūpārūpabhavena ekakkhattuparamo nāma. Sattakkhattuparamādayo
anya-e1102n4:2_66: nāma honti. Arahā pana pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvā dakkhiṇaṁ arahattā puna bhavā bhinibbattiyārahābhāvātyādinā
anya-e1102n4:2_67: vacanatthena arahā nāma. Sopi tividho jhānika sukkhavipassaka samasīsīvasena. Tattha
anya-e1102n4:2_68: jhāniko maggeneva āgato , so paṭisambhidāppatto nāma. Aparopi puthujjanasekkhasantāne
anya-e1102n4:2_69: jhāniko hutvā jhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā maggaṁ uppādeti, sopi jhānikova. Sukkhavipassako
anya-e1102n4:2_70: pana kilesakkhayamattameva maggena saha anāgatajhānaṁ nāma natthi, taṁ pacchā parihāyatītipi
anya-e1102n4:2_71: vadanti. Samasīsī pana tividho hoti iriyāpathasamasīsī, rogasamasīsī, jīvitasamasīsīti.
anya-e1102n4:2_72: Tattha yo ṭhānādīsu iriyāpathesu yeneva iriyapathena samannāgato hutvā vipassanaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_73: ārabhati, teneva iriyāpathena arahattaṁ patvā parinibbāyati ayaṁ iriyāpathasamasīsī
anya-e1102n4:2_74: nāma. Yo pana ekaṁ rogaṁ patvā antoroge eva vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṁ patvā
anya-e1102n4:2_75: teneva rogena parinibbāyati ayaṁ rogasamasīsi nāma. Yo pana terasasu sīsesu kilesasīsaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_76: avijjaṁ arahattamaggo pariyādiyati, pavattisīsaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ cuticittaṁ pariyādiyati,
anya-e1102n4:2_77: ayaṁ jīvitasamasīsīnāma. Tattha terasa sīsāni katamāni terasa sīsāni. Palibodhasīsaṁ,
anya-e1102n4:2_81: Ettha ca avijjā pariyādāyakaṁ maggacittaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ pariyādātuṁ sakkoti, jīvitapariyādāyakaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_82: cuticittaṁ avijjaṁ pariyādātuṁ na sakkoti, avijjā pariyādāyakaṁ cittaṁ aññaṁ, jīvitindriyapariyādāyakaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_83: cittaṁ aññaṁ. Kathaṁ panidaṁ sīsaṁ samaṁ hotīti. Vārasamatāya, yasmiñhi vāre maggavuṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_85: tathā sakadāmimagge pañca, anāgāmimagge pañca, arahattamagge sesakilesābhāvā cattārīti
anya-e1102n4:2_86: ekūnavīsatime paccavekkhaṇañāṇe patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṁ otaritvā parinibbāyato imāya
anya-e1102n4:2_87: vārasamatāya idaṁ ubhayasīsa pariyādānampi samaṁ hoti nāma. Arahattamagge ca pavattisīsaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_88: jīvitindriyaṁ pavattito vuṭṭhahanto maggo cutito uddhaṁ appavattikaraṇavasena yadipi
anya-e1102n4:2_89: pariyādiyati. Yāva pana cuti, tāva pavattisabhāvato pavattisīsaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ cuticittaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_90: pariyādiyati nāma. Kilesapariyādānena maggacittena attano anantaraṁ viya nipphādetabbā
anya-e1102n4:2_91: paccavekkhaṇavārāva paripuṇṇā. Paripuṇṇavasena pahīnakilese paccavekkhaṇato kilesapariyādānasseva
anya-e1102n4:2_92: vārāti vattabbataṁ arahanti, teneva kilesasīsaṁ avijjāpariyādānañca pavattisīsaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_93: jīvitindriyapariyādānañca samaṁ katvā imāya vārasamatāya kilesapariyādānaṁ jīvitapariyādānānaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_94: apubbacarimatā veditabbāti vuttaṁ. Saṁyuttaṭhakathāyaṁ pana yassa puggalassa apubbaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_95: acarimaṁ āsavapariyādānañca hoti jīvitapariyādānañca, ayaṁti puggalo samasīsī. Ettha
anya-e1102n4:2_96: ca pavattisīsaṁ kilesasīsanti dve sīsāni. Tattha pavattisīsaṁ nāma jīvitindriyaṁ.
anya-e1102n4:2_97: Kilesasīsaṁ nāma avijjā. Tesu jīvitindriyaṁ cuticittaṁ khepeti. Avijjaṁ maggacittaṁ.
anya-e1102n4:2_98: Dvinnaṁ cittānaṁ ekato uppādo natthi. Maggānantaraṁ pana phalaṁ, phalānantaraṁ bhavaṅgaṁ,
anya-e1102n4:2_99: bhavaṅgato vuṭṭhāya paccavekkhaṇaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ hoti, taṁ aparipuṇṇaṁ vāti. Tikhiṇena
anya-e1102n4:2_100: asinā sīse chindantepi hi eko vā dve vā paccavekkhaṇavārā avassaṁ uppajjantiyeva,
anya-e1102n4:2_101: cittānaṁ pana lahuparivattitāya āsavakkhayo ca jīvitapariyādānañca ekakkhaṇe viya
anya-e1102n4:2_102: sañjāyatī’ti vuttaṁ. Taṭṭīkāyañca ‘‘dvinnaṁ cittānanti cuticittamaggacittānaṁ. Tanti
anya-e1102n4:2_103: paccayavekallaṁ. Paripuṇṇaṁ javanacittānaṁ sattakkhattuṁ pavattiyā. Aparipuṇṇaṁ pañcakkhattuṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_104: pavattiyā. Kiñcāpi eko vā dve vā ti vuttaṁ, taṁ pana vacana siliṭṭhavasena vuttaṁ.
anya-e1102n4:2_105: Yāva ekaṁ vā dve vā tadārammaṇacittānīti heṭṭhimantena dve pavattantīti vadantī’’ti
anya-e1102n4:2_106: vuttaṁ. Ettha ca ‘‘paripuṇṇaṁ javanacittānaṁ sattakkhattuṁ pavattiyā, aparipuṇṇaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_107: pañchakkhattuṁ pavattiyā’’ti iminā aṭṭhakathāṭīkāvacanena samasīsīnaṁ paccavekkhaṇāvasena
anya-e1102n4:2_109: kriyajavanāni javantīti sanniṭṭhānametthāva gantabbaṁ. ‘‘Asammūḷho kālaṁ karotī’’ti
anya-e1102n4:2_110: vuttattā ca viññāyati sattakkhattuṁ paripuṇṇavasena maraṇāsannakāle javanapavatti.
anya-e1102n4:2_111: Evañca sati ‘‘mandappavattiyaṁ pana maraṇakālādīsu pañcavāramevā’’ti ettha ‘‘mandappavattiya’’nti
anya-e1102n4:2_112: visesanaṁ sātthakaṁ siyā. ‘‘Pañcavāramevā’’ti ettha evakārena mandappavattikāle chasattakkhattuṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_113: nivatteti. Asammūḷhakāle pana chasattakkhattumpi anujānāti. Kāmāvacarajavanānañca
anya-e1102n4:2_115: sattakkhattuṁ chakkhattuṁ vā, mandappavattiyaṁ pana maraṇakālādīsu pañcavārameva.
anya-e1102n4:2_116: Bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriyakālādīsu lahukappavattiyaṁ cattāri pañcavā paccavekkhaṇajavanacittāni
anya-e1102n4:2_117: bhavantī’’ti aniyamitappamāṇavasena uppattibhāvo āgato imasmiṁ samasīsiniddesavārepi
anya-e1102n4:2_118: maraṇāsannavīthicittassa visuṁ alabbhanato paccavekkhaṇanteyeva bhavaṅgacittena parinibbānato
anya-e1102n4:2_119: paripuṇṇavasena satta javanacittāni pāṭikaṅkhitabbānīti amhākaṁ khanti vīmaṁsitvā
anya-e1102n4:2_120: gahetabbo ito yuttataro vā pakāro labbhamāno gavesitabbo. Evaṁ paramatthasaṅghavasena
anya-e1102n4:2_121: cattāri purisayugāni, aṭṭha purisapuggalā, cattālīsampipuggalā aṭṭhasatampi purisapuggalāti
anya-e1102n4:2_122: sabbaṁ samodhānetvā imasmiṁ loke saṅghopi dullabhoti veditabbo tathā hi ariyapuggalā
anya-e1102n4:2_123: atidullabhāva sāsanassa vijjamānakālepi idāni sotāpannassāpi avijjamānato ayaṁ paramatthasaṅghavicāraṇā.
anya-e1102n4:2_124: Sammutisaṅgho pana ñatticatutthena upasampanno puthujjanasaṅghova, sopi dullabhoyeva.
anya-e1102n4:2_125: Kasmā buddhuppādakāleyeva labbhanato tathā hi anuppanne buddhe paccekabuddhānaṁ satasahassādigaṇane
anya-e1102n4:2_126: uppajjamānepi tesaṁ santike upasampadābhāvassa alabbhamānato paccekabuddhānañhi santike
anya-e1102n4:2_127: pabbajitānaṁ kulaputtānaṁ saraṇagamanakammaṭṭhānassāpi dātuṁ asakkuṇeyyattā. Paccekabuddhā
anya-e1102n4:2_128: ca nāma mūgassa supinadassanaṁ viya attanā paṭiladdhasaccadhamme paresaṁ ācikkhituṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_129: na sakkonti, tasmā te pabbājetvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojetuṁ asamatthā ‘‘evaṁ te nivāsetabbaṁ,
anya-e1102n4:2_130: evaṁ te pārupitabba’’nti ādinānayena abhisamācārikameva sikkhāpesuṁ tasmā buddhuppādakāleyeva
anya-e1102n4:2_131: sammutisaṅgho labbhati. Apica na te dullabhāyeva honti, atha kho tasmiṁ uddissa appamattakassāpi
anya-e1102n4:2_132: katākārassa asaṅkhyeyyaphalāpi honti vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā ‘‘bhavissanti kho panānanda
anya-e1102n4:2_133: anāgatamaddhānaṁ gotrabhuno kāsāvakaṇṭhā dussīlā pāpadhammā tesu dussīlesu saṅghaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_134: uddissa dānaṁ dassanti, tadā pāhaṁ ānanda saṅghagataṁ dakkhiṇaṁ asaṅkhyeyyaṁ appameyyaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_135: vadāmi na tvevāhaṁ ānanda kenaci pariyāyena saṅghagatā dakkhiṇā pāṭipuggalikaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_136: mahapphalanti vadāmī’’ti. Tathā hi uparipaṇṇāsake dakkhiṇavibhaṅgavaṇṇanāyaṁ ‘‘kāsāvakaṇṭhānaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_137: saṅghe dinne dakkhiṇāpi guṇāsaṅkhyāya asaṅkhyeyyā’’ti vuttaṁ. Saṅghagatadakkhiṇā
anya-e1102n4:2_138: hi saṅghe cittīkāraṁ kātuṁ sakkontassa hoti. Saṅghe pana cittīkāro dukkaro yo hi
anya-e1102n4:2_139: ‘‘saṅghagataṁ dakkhiṇaṁ dassāmī’’ti deyyadhammaṁ paṭiyādetvā vihāraṁ gantvā bhante
anya-e1102n4:2_140: saṅghaṁ uddissa ekaṁ theraṁ dethā’ti vadati, atha saṅghato sāmaṇeraṁ labhitvā ‘‘sāmaṇero
anya-e1102n4:2_141: me laddho’’ti aññathattaṁ āpajjati, tassa dakkhiṇā saṅghagatā na hoti. Mahātheraṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_142: labhitvā pi ‘‘mahāthero me laddho’’ti somanassaṁ uppādentassāpi na hotiyeva. Tassa
anya-e1102n4:2_143: dakkhiṇā saṅghagatā na hoti. Yo pana sāmaṇeraṁ upasampannaṁ vā daharaṁ vā theraṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_144: vā bālaṁ vā paṇḍitaṁ vā yaṁkiñci saṅghato labhitvā nibbematiko hutvā ‘‘saṅghassa
anya-e1102n4:2_145: dammī’’ti saṅghe cittīkāraṁ kātuṁ sakkoti, tassa dakkhiṇā saṅghagatā nāma hoti. Parasamuddavāsino
anya-e1102n4:2_146: kira evaṁ karonti tattha hi eko vihārassāmikuṭumbiko ‘‘saṅghagataṁ dakkhiṇaṁ dassāmī’’ti
anya-e1102n4:2_147: saṅghato uddisitvā ‘‘ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ dethā’’ti yācitvā so ekaṁ dussīlabhikkhuṁ labhitvā
anya-e1102n4:2_148: nisīdanaṭṭhānaṁ opuñjāpetvā āsanaṁ paññapetvā upari vitānaṁ bandhitvā gandhadhūmapupphehi
anya-e1102n4:2_149: pūjetvā pāde dhovitvā makkhetvā buddhassa nipaccakāraṁ karonto viya saṅghe cittīkārena
anya-e1102n4:2_150: deyyadhammaṁ adāsi so bhikkhu pacchābhattaṁ vihāraṁ jagganatthāya ‘‘kudālakaṁ dethā’’ti
anya-e1102n4:2_151: gharadvāraṁ āgato upāsako nisinnova kudālaṁ pādena khipitvā ‘‘gaṇhā’’ti adāsi tamenaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_152: manussā āhaṁsu ‘‘tumhehi pātova etassa katasakkāro vattuṁ na sakkā, idāni apacayamattakampi
anya-e1102n4:2_153: natthi, kiṁ nāmeta’’nti. Upāsako ‘‘saṅghassa so ayyo cittīkāro, na etassā’’ti āha.
anya-e1102n4:2_154: Kāsāvakaṇṭhasaṅghadinnadakkhiṇaṁ pana ko sodheti, sāriputtamoggalānādayo asītimahātherā
anya-e1102n4:2_155: sodhenti api ca therā ciraparinibbutā, there ādiṁ katvā yāvajjatanā dharamānakhīṇāsavā
anya-e1102n4:2_156: sodhentiyeva, tathā hi dāyakato paṭiggāhatopi mahapphalaṁ hoti dānaṁ. Dāyakato vessantarajātakaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_157: kathetabbaṁ vessantaro hi dussīlassa jūjakābrāhmaṇassa nayanasadise dve jālīkaṇhājine
anya-e1102n4:2_158: putte datvā pathaviṁ kampesi. Sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ ārabbha pavattacetanāya mahantabhāvena
anya-e1102n4:2_159: pathaviṁ kampesi. Evaṁ dāyakatopi mahapphalaṁ hoti. Paṭiggāhakato pana sāriputtattherassa
anya-e1102n4:2_160: dinnacoraghātakavatthu kathetabbaṁ coraghātako nāma hi sāvatthiyaṁ eko janapadapuriso
anya-e1102n4:2_161: pañcavīsati vassāni coraghātakakammaṁ katvā mahallakakālepi tiṁsa vassāni nāsikavāteneva
anya-e1102n4:2_162: kaṇṇanāsādīni chinditvā coraghātakakammaṁ karontasseva pañcapaññāsa vassāni vītivattāni.
anya-e1102n4:2_163: So maraṇa mañce nipannova attano kammabalena mahāniraye nibbatto viya mahāsaddaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_164: katvā dukkhito hoti, tassa saddena bhītā manussā ubhato passe gehaṁ chaḍḍetvā palāyiṁsu.
anya-e1102n4:2_165: Tadā sāriputtatthero dibbacakkhu nā lokaṁ volokento taṁ disvā tassa anukampaṁ paṭicca
anya-e1102n4:2_166: tassa gehadvāre aṭṭhāsi. So kujjhitvā tikkhattuṁ nāsikavātena vissajjamānopi vissajjituṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_167: asakkonto ativirocamānaṁ theraṁ disvā ativiya pasīditvā attano atthāya sampāditaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_168: pāyāsaṁ adāsi. Theropi maṅgalaṁ vaḍḍhetvā pakkami. Coraghātako therassa dinnadānaṁ
anya-e1102n4:2_169: anussaritvā sagge nibbatti, evaṁ paṭiggāhakatopi mahapphalaṁ hoti. Ubhayatopi mahapphalaṁ,
anya-e1102n4:5: Natthi citte pasannamhi, appakā nāma dakkhiṇā.
anya-e1102n4:8_0: Evaṁ ubhayavasena mahapphalabhāvo veditabbo. Dāyakatopi paṭiggāhakatopi nipphalameva.
anya-e1102n4:10: Na so saṅkhatadhammānaṁ, kalaṁ nāgghati soḷasi’’nti.
anya-e1102n4:11: Tenevāha bhagavā cattārimāni ānanda dakkhiṇavisuddhiyo’’ti. Imāni tīṇi buddhadhammasaṅgharatanāni sādhūnaṁ ratijananatthena ratanāni nāma.
anya-e1102n4:15_0: Ratanañca nāma duvidhaṁ saviññāṇakāviññāṇakavasena. Tattha aviññāṇakaṁ cakkaratanaṁ,
anya-e1102n4:15_1: maṇiratanaṁ yaṁ vā panaññampi anindriyabaddhasuvaṇṇarajatādi. Saviññāṇakaṁ hatthiassaratanādipariṇāyakaratanapariyosānaṁ,
anya-e1102n4:15_2: yaṁ vā panaññampi indriyabaddhaṁ. Evaṁ duvidhe cettha saviññāṇakaratanaṁ aggamakkhāyati,
anya-e1102n4:15_3: kasmā yasmā aviññāṇakaṁ suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādiratanaṁ saviññāṇakānaṁ hattiratanādīnaṁ
anya-e1102n4:15_4: alaṅkāratthāya upanīyati. Saviññāṇakaratanampi duvidhaṁ tiracchānagataratanaṁ manussaratanañca.
anya-e1102n4:15_5: Tattha manussaratanaṁ aggamakkhāyati. Kasmā yasmā tiracchānagataratanaṁ manussaratanassa
anya-e1102n4:15_6: opavayhaṁ hoti. Manussaratanampi duvidhaṁ itthiratanaṁ purisaratanañca. Tattha purisaratanaṁ
anya-e1102n4:15_7: aggamakkhāyati. Kasmā yasmā itthiratanaṁ purisaratanassa paricārikattaṁ āpajjati.
anya-e1102n4:15_8: Purisaratanampi duvidhaṁ agārikaratanaṁ anagārikaratanañca tattha anagārikaratanaṁ
anya-e1102n4:15_9: aggamakkhāyati. Kasmā yasmā agārikaratanesu aggo cakkavattīpi sīlādiguṇayuttaṁ anagārikaratanaṁ
anya-e1102n4:15_10: pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā upaṭṭhahitvā payirupāsitvā dibbamānussikā sampattiyo pāpuṇitvā
anya-e1102n4:15_11: ante nibbānasampattiṁ pāpuṇāti. Anagārikaratanampi duvidhaṁ ariyaputhujjanavasena.
anya-e1102n4:15_12: Ariyaratanampi duvidhaṁ sekkhāsekkhavasena. Asekkharatanampi duvidhaṁ sukkhavipassakasamathayānikavasena.
anya-e1102n4:15_15: aggamakkhāyati. Kasmā guṇamahattatāya. Sāriputtamoggalānasadisāpi hi anekasatā sāvakā
anya-e1102n4:15_16: paccekabuddhassa guṇānaṁ satabhāgampi na upanenti. Paccekabuddhato sambuddharatanaṁ
anya-e1102n4:15_17: aggamakkhāyati. Kasmā guṇamahattatāya sakalampi jambudīpaṁ pallaṅke na pallaṅkaṁ
anya-e1102n4:15_18: ghaṭṭento nisinnā paccekasambuddhā ekassa guṇānaṁ neva saṅkhyaṁ kalaṁ gaṇanabhāgaṁ
anya-e1102n4:15_19: upanenti, vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā ‘‘yāvatā bhikkhave sattā apadā vā…pe… tathāgato tesaṁ
anya-e1102n4:15_20: aggamakkhāyatī’’ti ādi. Evaṁ ‘‘buddho ca dullabho loke, saddhammasavanampi ca, saṅgho
anya-e1102n4:15_21: ca dullabho loke’’ti imesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ padānaṁ atthuddhāravasena sabbaso attho vuttoyeva hoti.
